title: Pressure to Win, Young Guns, Chasing Points: Does January Success Guarantee Summer Dominance?
content:
What do the winter races tell us about summer success? There might not be a straight line from January to July, but a strong start pays dividends later.

Read the full article at Pressure to Win, Young Guns, Chasing Points: Does January Success Guarantee Summer Dominance? on Velo.
author: ahood
